name: Upload Project Report
description: Finalize and upload the complete project report with charts and analysis.

name: Hold Team Review
description: Organize a review meeting to evaluate the sprint progress and outcomes.

name: Refactor Application Code
description: Improve code structure and remove redundant logic from the core modules.

name: Review Client Comments
description: Go through client feedback and note down requested changes.

name: Optimize Frontend Speed
description: Enhance UI responsiveness by optimizing images and minifying resources.

name: Perform Security Testing
description: Run penetration tests to identify and fix security loopholes.

name: Launch Beta Product
description: Deploy the beta version of the app and gather user feedback.
